module.name: condition_evaluation
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of a record of the evaluation of a condition.

inscope.li: Identification of a condition that has been evaluated;
Recording of parameter values evaluated and evaluation result.

outscope.li: Characterization of the evaluation of a condition;
The computation or conversion of parameter values.
